飭 (Simplified: 饬)
Pinyin: chì
English Definition: keep in order; stern; to order; direct
Total strokes: 13; Radical: 食
Pictophonetic: 飠 indicates the sound; 力 (strength) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 飠 [ shí ] food; to eat
    • ⿱ Above to below
      • 力 [ lì ] strength, power; capability, influence

Original meaning 本义: Meaning command 飭令.

飭字的基本解释

飭
chì
见“饬”。

飭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chì］
［《廣韻》恥力切，入職，徹。］
“饬1”的繁体字。“飾2”的被通假字。
(1)整治；整顿。
(2)谨慎；谨严。
(3)命令；告诫。
(4)旧时亦指上级对下属的一种公文。参见“飭令”。
(5)教诲；教导。
(6)指责；斥责。
(7)用同“坼”。参见“飭散”。
[②]［shì］
［《五音集韻》賞職切，入職］
“饬2”的繁体字。通“飾1”。
(1)装饰；修饰。
(2)巧饰；巧伪。

飭字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　飭； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1417第15
【廣韻】恥力切【集韻】【韻會】蓄力切，?音敕。【說文】致堅也。【玉篇】謹貌。【禮·樂記】再始以著往，復亂以飭歸。【註】再擊鼓以明其進，復擊鐃以謹其退也。　又修治。【易·雜卦】蠱則飭也。　又勤也。【周禮·天官·大宰】百工飭化八材。【疏】飭，勤也。又【冬官·考工記】飭力以長地財，謂之農夫。　又【廣韻】整備也。【詩·小雅】戎車旣飭。【傳】飭，正也。【禮·月令】仲冬飭死事。【註】誓戒六軍，厲必死之志也。【前漢·武帝紀】飭躬齋戒。　又與敕同。命令也。【齊語】飭其子弟，相語以事。【前漢·張敞傳】明飭長吏守丞。　【集韻】或作飾。

考證：〔【周禮·天官·大宰】百工飭化八材。【註】飭，勤也。〕　謹照原文註改疏。〔【詩·小雅】我車旣飭。【註】飭，正也。〕　謹照原文我車改戎車。註改傳。

饬
chì

饬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chì］
["Guangyun" is shameful, entertaining, and thorough. ]
Traditional characters for "饬1". "Decoration 2" was passed falsely.
(1) Rectification; rectification.
(2) Be cautious; careful.
(3) Order; caution.
(4) In the old days, it also refers to a type of official document issued by superiors to subordinates. See "Fu Ling".
(5) Teaching; teaching.
(6) Accusation; rebuke.
(7) Use the same as "坼". See "Wu San".
[②]［shì］
["Five Yin Jiyun" Appreciation and Entry]
Traditional characters for "饬2". Same as "Decoration 1".
(1) Decoration; modification.
(2) Ingenious decoration; ingenious and fake.
饬

[Guang Yun] Shame force cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] charge to cut,? Yin Chi. [Said the text] Zhi Jian also. [Jade articles] Look carefully. [Li·Le Ji] Start again with reciprocity, and return to chaos. [Note] Beat the drum again to show that it is going forward, and beat it again to remind it to retreat.　 Shuji again. 【Easy·Miscellaneous Gua】The Gu is the same.　Also diligent. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Da Zai】Hundreds of works are made of eight materials. 【Sparse】Fu, Qin Ye. Also [Dongguan·Kaogongji] The farmer is called a farmer for long-term wealth.　[Guangyun] It’s also ready. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Rong Che-chan. 【Biography】Fu, Zhengye. [Rite·Yue Order] Midwinter's death. [Note] If you swear to give up the Six Army, Li will die. 【Pre-Han·Wu Emperor Ji】Fuji fast fast.　Same as Chi. Order also. 【Qiyu】Fuqi's children, talk about things. [Previous Han·Zhang Chang Biography] Ming Fu's chief official Shoucheng.　【Ji Yun】or as an ornament.
